mdRecord.dcterms:title: Boody House in New Durham, N. H.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: 'The Boody House was at one time the largest in the town. In the room at the right of the door the church was organized with seven members. The room still contains the table, the chair used by Randal. It is kept as near as possible in its original condition.' Once Used as a Church by Benjamin Randal, one of the Founders of the Free Will Baptists and Storer College.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Boodey, Joseph, 1773 1867
